title: Epic: Variables and identifiers
description: Decide and implement variable binding or forbid bare names; adjust tokenizer/transition rules; add undefined-variable status.

title: Task: Define variable model
description: Choose approach: support symbol table with assignment or forbid bare names; document decision and update transition rules accordingly.

title: Task: Implement variable handling or errors
description: If supporting variables: add assignment parsing, symbol table lookup, undefined-variable status; otherwise emit syntax/status errors on bare names. Add tests.

title: Task: Guard stack access and function errors
description: Add checks before stack.top()/pop for commas/parentheses and unknown functions; set CalculatorStatus for missing operands/unknown function.

title: Epic: Memory and API hygiene
description: Own _defFunc entries (smart pointers/value), cleanup on destruction, prevent leaks/dup registration, and document registration API.

title: Task: Manage function ownership
description: Introduce smart-pointer ownership for registered functions, cleanup in destructor, and guard duplicate registrations.

title: Task: Document registration API
description: Clarify how to add user functions, expected ownership, and error returns; update README/headers.

title: Epic: Diagnostics and tests
description: Expand tests for arity/unknown identifiers/comma errors/runtime faults and improve error messages with token/position context.

title: Task: Expand negative test coverage
description: Add tests for arity mismatch, unknown identifiers, malformed commas, and runtime math faults.

title: Task: Improve error messaging
description: Add token/position info to CalculatorStatus output and expose optional diagnostics string.

title: Epic: Numerics and output
description: Improve numeric parsing (scientific notation, validation), overflow/domain checks, and configurable output precision.

title: Task: Add scientific notation parsing
description: Extend tokenizer to parse E/e numbers robustly; validate tokens and add tests.

title: Task: Runtime math fault handling
description: Detect div-by-zero/domain errors (pow/exp/log/sqrt), map to CalculatorStatus, and cover with tests.
